entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 then light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
